title: A Compilation of Side Stories
description: Read about the first meetings of the The Lux Guardians characters in this eBook.Find out how Miya and Yosiah became friends in A New Companion.In novella A Quintessential Flame, read about the events that brought Horatia and Marrin together and the evolution of their relationship.Dalmar and Hele meet for the first time in The Sufferer and The Witness.
author: Saruuh Kelsey
